input_text:
Job Title: Heavy Equipment Mechanic | $25 - $30/HR

Location: Lewiston, ID

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Do you have experience as a Diesel Mechanic? Express is searching for an experienced Diesel Mechanics to work on Farming Equipment, Fleet Vehicles, Semi Trucks, and other Heavy Machinery!

If you have ever done this type of work, we would love to hear from you!

Job Title: Diesel Mechanic

Location: Opportunities in Moscow, Lewiston, Pullman, Clarkston!

Wage: Starting at $25.00+/Hour (D.O.E.)

Shifts: Flexible

Responsibilities: Perform routine maintenance and repair work on trucks and heavy equipment including: oil changes, filter replacements, and fluid checks.Diagnose and repair diesel engine malfunctions and mechanical issues.Conduct inspections to identify and troubleshoot problems in diesel-powered vehicles and equipment.Collaborate with other team members to prioritize and complete work orders in a timely manner.Utilize diagnostic tools and equipment to identify and resolve issues with diesel engines.Order necessary parts for maintenance and repairs and maintain accurate repair records.Stay updated with industry standards and adhere to training regulations.Drive/Transport trucks as needed to drop off locations.Keep accurate records of maintenance and repair activities.Adhere to safety protocols and maintain a clean and organized work environment.

Requirements: Must be a diesel mechanic qualified for maintenance/service work on trucks.Completion of a diesel mechanic program and 2-3 years of experience preferred but not required!Experience in troubleshooting and repairs for hydraulic systems including brake inspections.Valid CDL B (minimum) with Air Brake Endorsement highly preferred but not requiredStrong attention to detail and commitment to safety.Highly organized and able to prioritize tasks effectively.

Benefits:

 Comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, vision, and life insurance- 401-K retirement plan- Generous vacation policy- Additional perks and incentives

Ways to Apply (choose one): Email your resume to jaclyn.mitchell@expresspros.comCall our office at (208)743-6507 to schedule a phone interviewVisit our office located at: 624 Bryden Ave., Lewiston, ID 83501Apply online at https://www.expresspros.com/lewistonid

About Express:

Express Employment Professionals is one of the top staffing companies in the U.S. Every day, we help people find jobs and provide workforce solutions to businesses. Express offers a full range of employment solutions, including full-time, temporary, and part-time employment in a wide range of positions, including Professional, Light Industrial, and Office Services.

We have connections and relationships with hundreds of LC Valley and Pullman/Moscow businesses. Interviewing with us is like interviewing with multiple companies at once. We find the right fit for your skillset and desired culture to maximize your success in finding long-term employment.

#3206

PandoLogic. Keywords: Heavy Equipment Mechanic, Location: Lewiston, ID - 83501

Experience Level (if available): None
